title: Forget Facebook and Twitter todays teenagers turn to Snapchat
text:
Forget Facebook and Twitter, today's teenagers turn to Snapchat 
Daily Mail Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Former Spice Girl Geri Horner is accused of 'patronizing' Nobel Prize winner Malala Yousafzai during TV interview... before misspelling her name on Twitter 
...
